title: Hacker Found
body:
I need a rioter to talk to me in skype please..
Skype : --------------
will appreciate it..

replies.body:
You're free to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but if you're needing to report someone the best way to do so in is the post game lobby.

I edited out your Skype name, just to prevent unwanted messages and such.
